entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
